title: Former Bachelor star Louise Pillidge makes a rare public appearance at her brother's wedding
text:
She's been keeping a low profile ever since her dramatic split from controversial Bachelor Blake Garvey in April 2016, but on Wednesday, Louise Pillidge gave fans a rare glimpse into her personal life.

Taking to Instagram, the 31-year-old former Bachelor star shared a series of photos from her brother's recent wedding in Ireland.

The now brunette former reality star looked pretty in a floral print chiffon dress, which she paired with white pointy-toe stilettos.

Wedding belle: Taking to Instagram on Wednesday, former Bachelor star Louise Pillidge shared a series of photos from her brother's recent wedding in Ireland

She carried a black Chanel handbag, and wore her long hair loose and swept over to one side.

'Such a perfect day! Congratulations to my brother Simon and his beautiful wife Clare,' she captioned the photos, adding a twin heart emoji.

It was a rare post from Louise, who remains largely silent on social media.

Second place: After appearing on The Bachelor in 2014, Louise placed runner-up after Sam Frost, who scored a proposal from then-Bachelor Blake Garvey

Rare sightings: Before sharing photos from her brother's wedding, her last post was in July, with the one before that being in February for her birthday

Before sharing photos from her brother's wedding, her last post was in July, with the one before that being in February for her birthday.

After appearing on The Bachelor in 2014, Louise placed runner-up after Sam Frost, who scored a proposal from then-Bachelor Blake, 36.

But shortly after the finale aired, it was revealed Blake had dumped Sam, 30, and taken up with Louise again.

Separate ways: The former Bachelor star has kept a low profile ever since her dramatic split from controversial Bachelor Blake Garvey in April 2016

The two dated until 2016, before announcing their break up.

'It feels surreal, and since then I have gone through so many emotions. I've been crying, numb and angry,' Louise told New Idea magazine at the time of their split.

'The negativity has been draining, plus it took months to deal with the fact I was Blake's third choice of partner.'
description: She's been keeping a low profile ever since her dramatic split from The Bachelor's Blake Garvey in 2016, but on Wednesday, Louise Pillidge gave fans a rare glimpse into her personal life.
authors: Demeter Stamell For Daily Mail Australia
